thread.title: Apple To Launch New iPhone 7 'Red', New iPad Pro And 128GB iPhone SE Soon
thread.title_full: Apple To Launch New iPhone 7 'Red', New iPad Pro And 128GB iPhone SE Soon

author: Shreyansh Jain
title: Apple To Launch New iPhone 7 'Red', New iPad Pro And 128GB iPhone SE Soon
text:
Apple To Launch New iPhone 7 'Red', New iPad Pro And 128GB iPhone SE Soon 754 396 iPhone 7 Red New iPad Pro 128GB iPhone SE 1. Red Colored iPhone 7 and 7 Plus 
It is very much expected that the new colour of iPhone 7 and 7 Plus will be introduced. The price of the new variant will be the same as the current market price of the available iPhones. 2. iPad Pro Launch: via 
Apple is also looking forward to introduce iPad in other sizes also. 
In terms of the iPad Pro lineup, the report claims Apple will announce it in new 7.9-inch, 9.7-inch, 10.5-inch, and 12.9-inch models. The 10.5-inch model may not ship until May, while the other sizes are said to be shipped in March, Source- Mac Otakara . 
Earlier this month Apple CEO Tim Cook also stated, " We've got some exciting things coming on iPad, and I am optimistic about where things are headed". 
The price of the new iPad Pro is expected to be more than the currently available iPad Pro in the market. via 
All the iPad will have the same dimensions, so it means that the high-end 10.5inch iPad will have very minimal bezels. 
iPad Pro 10.5 inch variant will have the Apple's own A10X chip while the budget-end iPad 9.7 inch will have A9X chip inside it. 3. iPhone SE 128GB: via 
Apple will be launching 128GB variant of the iPhone SE, which will be joining the current 16GB and 128GB variant. 
The price of iPhone SE is hard to guess at this point of time, but we can expect anything around $520. 
Apple will also be launching new Apple Bands. More colours will be added to the existing one in the market. It's also believed that Apple might change the material and look of the current Apple Bands. 
We will be covering more on Apple Spring, So, stay tuned for that! Aren't you eager to try Apple's new iPad devices? others like
